message.raw:
Merged in synchronized_atlas_states_msg (pull request #137)

create an AtlasStates.msg aggregating all information in sensor_msgs/JointState sensor_msgs/Imu and atlas_msgs/ForceTorqueSensors so data are synchronized in a single publish.
